betterquesting:10.desc:8:
You can use some of your left over plants, samplings, crops, etc and make some early fuel to generate some electricity before you build a full distillation tower setup.  Early on you can make ethanol with your plant matter, crops and samplings.  The first step you will need to do is to create some biomass.  To create biomass you will need a Fermenter.  Is some crops don't work, put them in your shredder to generate plant remains.  Just make a burning box to supply the required HU units to start the fermenting process.
§b
Note:  You can put that Rotten Flesh that you get from killing zombies in your shredder to get Rotten Minced Meat which you can put in a fermenter to make Biomass.  There are quite a bit of thinks you can use in a fermenter but you will need to either use a compressor and/or shredder to get it in a state that the fermenter accepts.
§a
To complete this quest craft:
1 Steel Fermentor
